Text: RE HELLOJeff Thank you very much I understand the agreement for Dec and I will not let you down I will be in the office in about hrs can you leave an envelope for me at the security desk in the Enron bldg I work at AC and my ext is I just want you to know that I am very proud of Jennifer and I know that she respects you and enjoys working for you Thank you for giving her the opportunity of a life time Once again thank you and I am going to get out of my situation because I can do better Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A JeffreyA NRONcom Date Thu Mar I understand and will help When and how should I send you a check Since we have not met youll understand my concern but Jennifer is a great help to me so I know this will help her I will print out your email and my response and upon your cashing my check we will have agreed that you will owe me and that you have until dec to repay in full You also understand that I rely upon you that you know your intent to repay the loan as stated above Not that it is any of my business but if you are that affraid of your husband Jeff Original Message From detraylor ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESdetraylorCdetraylormailEevEnet E NRONcom Sent Thursday March AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject HELLO Jeff Hi I Donnis Jennifers mom I know we have not formally met but I fill like I know you Jeff I am in serious trouble During my dads last few months I had to pay his expenses plus most of his funeral As a result I am now in forclosure on my home The worst part of that is my husband does not know He cant find out because he would kill me and I am not just using that as a figure of speech I am very scared Jennifer must not know because she is on top of the world right now and she doesnt need to have my worrries Jeff could you please loan me just for a few months I can reinstate the loan but I have to do it within the next hours I know this is very strange for you but I am so desperate that I can not eat or sleep I am not usually like this but I have noone that can help me I can be reached at Thanks Donnis
